00031 // File local defines
00033 #define GLB_HDR_STR             "GLB_HDR   - EVT COUNT   : %08x GEO      : %08x \n"
00034 #define GLB_TRL_STR             "GLB_TRL   - STATUS      : %08x WCOUNT   : %08x GEO     : %08x \n"
00035 #define TDC_HDR_STR             " TDC_HDR  - TDC         : %08x EVT ID   : %08x BUNCH ID: %08x \n"
00036 #define TDC_MSR_STR             "  TDC_MSR - TRAILING    : %08x CH       : %08x MEASURE : %08x \n"
00037 #define TDC_ERR_STR             "  TDC_ERR - TDC         : %08x ERR FLAGS: %08x \n"
00038 #define TDC_TRL_STR             " TDC_TRL  - TDC         : %08x EVT ID   : %08x WCOUNT  : %08x \n"
00039 #define TDC_TRG_STR             "  TDC_TRG - TRG TIME TAG: %08x \n"
00040 #define FILLER_STR              "  FILLER  - \n"
00041 #define UNKNOWN_STR             "\n??? UNKNOWN TAG ??? -          READ WORD: %08x \n\n"

00070 int main(int argc, char **argv) 
00071 
00072 {
00073         int ret_val= 0;                                                                 // procedure exit value
00074         cvt_V1190_data board_data;                                              // board data
00075         user_setting_data user_setting;                                 // user settings
00076         FILE* parsed_out_file= NULL;                                    // parsed output file
00077         FILE* raw_out_file= NULL;                                               // raw output file
00078         UINT8 *data_buff= NULL;                                                 // read data buffer
00079         UINT32 data_size;
00080         int32_t vme_handle= -1;                                                 // The CAENVMELib handle
00081         long read_events= 0;
00082         const int DATA_BUFF_SIZE= 1024*1024;                    // The data buffer size
00083 
00085         // Demo application specific
00087 
00088         memset( &user_setting, 0, sizeof( user_setting));
00089         memset( &board_data, 0, sizeof( board_data));
00090 
00091         //
00092         // init the console module
00093         con_init( );
00094 
00095         //
00096         // print header
00097         con_printf( "\n");
00098         con_printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00099         con_printf( "-           C A E N    V 1 1 9 0    D E M O           -\n");
00100         con_printf( "-                                                     -\n");
00101         con_printf( "-   www.caen.it                             rev.01.00 -\n");
00102         con_printf( "-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00103         con_printf( "\n");
00104 
00105         //
00106         // init user setting module
00107         if( !user_settings_open( &user_setting))
00108         {
00109                 ret_val= -1;
00110                 goto exit_point;
00111         }
00112 
00113         //
00114         // input parameter check
00115         if( !user_settings_parse_input_param( &user_setting, argc, (char**)argv))
00116         {
00117                 ret_val= -2;
00118                 goto exit_point;
00119         }
00120         //
00121         // Vme handle initialization
00122         while( TRUE)
00123         {
00124                 if( CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, 0, 0, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess)
00125                 {
00126                         user_setting.m_board_type= cvV1718;
00127                         user_setting.m_board_number= 0;
00128                         user_setting.m_link_number= 0;
00129                         break;
00130                 }
00131                 if( CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, 0, 0, &vme_handle)== cvSuccess)
00132                 {
00133                         user_setting.m_board_type= cvV2718;
00134                         user_setting.m_board_number= 0;
00135                         user_setting.m_link_number= 0;
00136                         break;
00137                 }
00138                 TRACE("VME INIT ERROR :  press 'Q' to quit or any other key to retry\n");
00139                 if( toupper( con_getch()) == 'Q')
00140                 {
00141                         ret_val= -3;
00142                         goto exit_point;
00143                 }
00144         }
00145 
00147         // Library specific
00149 
00150         //
00151         // init V1190 board data
00152         TRACE(  " Initializing V1190 board data ... ");
00153         if( !cvt_V1190_open( &board_data, user_setting.m_base_address, vme_handle, user_setting.m_V1190_type))
00154         {       
00155                 TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V1190_open \n");
00156                 ret_val= -4;
00157                 goto exit_point;
00158         }
00159         TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00160 
00161         //
00162         // Get system informations
00163         {
00164                 UINT32 tdc_id_buff[ MAX_V1190_TDC_COUNT];
00165                 UINT16 firmware_rev;
00166                 UINT16 micro_firmware_rev;
00167                 UINT16 serial_number;
00168                 int i; 
00169 
00170                 TRACE(  " Getting system informations ... ");
00171                 if( !cvt_V1190_get_system_info( &board_data, &firmware_rev, tdc_id_buff, &micro_firmware_rev, &serial_number))
00172                 {
00173                         TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V1190_get_system_info \n");
00174                         ret_val= -5;
00175                         goto exit_point;
00176                 }
00177                 TRACE(  " Ok \n\n");
00178 
00179                 // Show system infos
00180                 TRACE1( "   Firmware Rev.       : %04x\n", firmware_rev);
00181                 TRACE1( "   Micro Firmware Rev. : %04x\n", micro_firmware_rev);
00182                 TRACE1( "   Serial Number       : %04x\n", serial_number);
00183                 for( i= 0; i< user_setting.m_tdc_count; i++)
00184                 {
00185                         TRACE2( "   TDC %d               : %08x\n", i, tdc_id_buff[ i]);
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         //
00189         // data clear
00190         TRACE(  " Sending data clear ... ");
00191         if( !cvt_V1190_data_clear( &board_data))        
00192         {       
00193                 TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V1190_data_clear \n");
00194                 ret_val= -5;
00195                 goto exit_point;
00196         }
00197         TRACE(  " Ok \n");
00198 
00199         //
00200         // Acquisition mode
00201         TRACE(  " Setting acquisition mode ... ");
00202         switch( user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_mode)
00203         {
00204         case AM_CONTINUOUS:
00205                 if( !cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode( &board_data, 
00206                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_continuos.m_edge_detection,
00207                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_continuos.m_res_width,
00208                                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_continuos.m_enable_msk[0]))
00209                 {       
00210                         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V1190_set_continuous_acquisition_mode \n");
00211                         ret_val= -5;
00212                         goto exit_point;
00213                 }
00214                 break;
00215         case AM_TRIGGER_MATCH:
00216                 if( !cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode(   &board_data, 
00217                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_window_width,
00218                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_window_offset,
00219                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_extra_search_margin,
00220                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_reject_margin,
00221                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_edge_detection,
00222                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_res_width,
00223                                                                                                                                 &user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_enable_msk[0],
00224                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_header_trailer_enable,
00225                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_empty_event_enable,
00226                                                                                                                                 user_setting.m_acquisition_mode.m_params.m_trigger_matching.m_trigger_time_tag_enable))
00227                 {       
00228                         TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V1190_set_trigger_matching_acquisition_mode \n");
00229                         ret_val= -5;
00230                         goto exit_point;
00231                 }
00232                 break;
00233         case AM_NONE:
00234                 break;
00235         }
00236         TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00237 
00238         //
00239         // readout mode
00240         TRACE(  " Setting readout mode ...");
00241         if( !cvt_V1190_set_readout_mode( &board_data, TRUE, TRUE, 1))
00242         {       
00243                 TRACE( "Error executing cvt_V1190_set_readout_mode \n");
00244                 ret_val= -5;
00245                 goto exit_point;
00246         }
00247         TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00248 
00249         // Allocate buffer storage
00250         data_buff= malloc( DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00251         if( data_buff== NULL)
00252         {
00253                 // Insufficient memory
00254                 TRACE1( "Error allocating events' buffer (%li bytes)", DATA_BUFF_SIZE);
00255                 ret_val= -5;
00256                 goto exit_point;
00257         }
00258 
00259         // Create output files
00260         if( ( parsed_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename, "wt"))== NULL)
00261         {
00262                 TRACE1( "Error creating parsed output file '%s'", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00263                 ret_val= -5;
00264                 goto exit_point;
00265         }
00266         if( ( raw_out_file= fopen( user_setting.m_raw_output_filename, "w+b"))== NULL)
00267         {
00268                 TRACE1( "Error creating raw output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_raw_output_filename);
00269                 ret_val= -5;
00270                 goto exit_point;
00271         }
00272 
00273         //
00274         // Start acquisition 
00275         TRACE(  " Getting events: hit any key to abort ...\n");
00276         TRACE(  "\n");
00277 
00278         while((( read_events< user_setting.m_num_events)|| (user_setting.m_num_events<= 0))&&
00279                         !con_kbhit())
00280         {
00281                 static long last_read_bytes= 0;
00282                 static long read_bytes= 0;
00283                 data_size= DATA_BUFF_SIZE;
00284                 //
00285                 // Read from MEB .....
00286                 if( !cvt_V1190_read_MEB( &board_data, data_buff, &data_size))
00287                 {
00288                         TRACE( " \nError executing cvt_V1190_read_MEB \n");
00289                         ret_val= -5;
00290                         goto exit_point;
00291                 }
00292                 if( !data_size)
00293                         continue;
00294                 //
00295                 // .... and store raw data into file
00296                 if( fwrite( data_buff, 1, data_size, raw_out_file)!= data_size)
00297                 {
00298                         TRACE( " \nError writing raw data file \n");
00299                         ret_val= -5;
00300                         goto exit_point;
00301                 }
00302                 read_bytes+= data_size;
00303                 if( ( read_bytes>> 10)!= ( last_read_bytes>> 10))
00304                 {
00305                         // 
00306                         // Give user a feedback every 1KB data
00307                         TRACE( ".");
00308                 }
00309                 last_read_bytes= read_bytes;
00310         }
00311         TRACE(  "\n Done \n");
00312         TRACE(  " Parsing events and writing to output file ... ");
00313 
00314         //
00315         // Post process data : parse raw data and store events in clear text
00316         if( fflush( raw_out_file))
00317         {
00318                 TRACE1( "\nError flushing raw output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_raw_output_filename);
00319                 ret_val= -5;
00320                 goto exit_point;
00321         }
00322         if( fseek( raw_out_file, 0, SEEK_SET))
00323         {
00324                 TRACE1( "\nError flushing raw output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_raw_output_filename);
00325                 ret_val= -5;
00326                 goto exit_point;
00327         }
00328 
00329         while( ( data_size= ( UINT32)fread( data_buff, 4, DATA_BUFF_SIZE>> 2, raw_out_file)))
00330         {
00331                 UINT32 *tmp_buff= (UINT32*)data_buff;
00332                 char line[ 400];
00333                 size_t str_len;
00334 
00335                 while( data_size-- > 0)
00336                 {
00337                         UINT32 data= *(tmp_buff++);
00338                         *line= '\0';
00339                         switch( data& CVT_V1190_DATA_TYPE_MSK)
00340                         {
00341                         case CVT_V1190_GLOBAL_HEADER:
00342                                 {
00343                                         // Global header
00344                                         UINT32 event_count= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_HDR_EVENT_COUNT( data);
00345                                         UINT32 geo= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_HDR_GEO( data);
00346 
00347                                         sprintf( line, GLB_HDR_STR, event_count, geo);
00348                                 }
00349                                 break;
00350                         case CVT_V1190_GLOBAL_TRAILER:
00351                                 {
00352                                         // Global trailer
00353                                         UINT32 status= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_TRL_STATUS( data);
00354                                         UINT32 wcount= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_TRL_WCOUNT( data);
00355                                         UINT32 geo= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_TRL_GEO( data);
00356 
00357                                         sprintf( line, GLB_TRL_STR, status, wcount, geo);
00358                                 }
00359                                 break;
00360                         case CVT_V1190_TDC_HEADER:
00361                                 {
00362                                         // TDC header
00363                                         UINT32 tdc= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_HDR_TDC( data);
00364                                         UINT32 event_id= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_HDR_EVENT_ID( data);
00365                                         UINT32 bunch_id= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_HDR_BUNCH_ID( data);
00366 
00367                                         sprintf( line, TDC_HDR_STR, tdc, event_id, bunch_id);
00368                                 }
00369                                 break;
00370                         case CVT_V1190_TDC_MEASURE:
00371                                 {
00372                                         // TDC measure
00373                                         UINT32 trailing= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_MSR_TRAILING( data);
00374                                         UINT32 channel= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_MSR_CHANNEL( data);
00375                                         UINT32 measure= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_HDR_MEASURE( data);
00376 
00377                                         sprintf( line, TDC_MSR_STR, trailing, channel, measure);
00378                                 }
00379                                 break;
00380                         case CVT_V1190_TDC_ERROR:
00381                                 {
00382                                         UINT32 tdc= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_ERR_TDC( data);
00383                                         UINT32 err_flags= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_ERR_ERR_FLAGS( data);
00384 
00385                                         sprintf( line, TDC_ERR_STR, tdc, err_flags);
00386                                 }
00387                                 break;
00388                         case CVT_V1190_TDC_TRAILER:
00389                                 {
00390                                         UINT32 tdc= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_TRL_TDC( data);
00391                                         UINT32 event_id= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_TRL_EVENT_ID( data);
00392                                         UINT32 wcount= CVT_V1190_GET_TDC_TRL_WCOUNT( data);
00393 
00394                                         sprintf( line, TDC_TRL_STR, tdc, event_id, wcount);
00395                                 }
00396                                 break;
00397                         case CVT_V1190_GLOBAL_TRIGGER_TIME:
00398                                 {
00399                                         UINT32 trg_time_tag= CVT_V1190_GET_GLB_TRG_TIME_TAG( data);
00400 
00401                                         sprintf( line, TDC_TRG_STR, trg_time_tag);
00402                                 }
00403                                 break;
00404                         case CVT_V1190_FILLER:
00405                                 {
00406                                         sprintf( line, FILLER_STR);
00407                                 }
00408                                 break;
00409                         default:
00410                                 {
00411                                         sprintf( line, UNKNOWN_STR, data);
00412                                 }
00413                                 break;
00414                         }
00415                         if( (str_len= strlen( line))> 0)
00416                         {
00417                                 if( fwrite( line, 1, str_len, parsed_out_file)!= str_len)
00418                                 {
00419                                         // error writing file
00420                                         TRACE1( "\nError writing parsed output file '%s' \n", user_setting.m_parsed_output_filename);
00421                                         ret_val= -5;
00422                                         goto exit_point;
00423                                 }
00424                         }
00425                 }
00426         }       
00427         TRACE(  " Ok\n");
00428 
00429 exit_point:     
00431         // Library specific
00433         
00434         //
00435         // Release board resources
00436         if( !cvt_V1190_close( &board_data))
00437         {       
00438                 TRACE( "\nError executing cvt_V1190_close\n");
00439         }
00440 
00442         // Demo application specific
00444 
00445         if( raw_out_file!= NULL)
00446         {
00447                 fclose( raw_out_file);
00448         }
00449         if( parsed_out_file!= NULL)
00450         {
00451                 fclose( parsed_out_file);
00452         }
00453         if( data_buff!= NULL)
00454         {
00455                 free( data_buff);
00456         }
00457 
00458         // close modules
00459         user_settings_close( &user_setting);
00460 
00461         TRACE( "Hit a key to exit ...");
00462         con_getch();
00463         //
00464         // close the console module
00465         con_end( );
00466 
00467         return ret_val;
00468 }
